title: Contacts
lede: Manage your customer contacts with comprehensive profiles and interaction history.

sections.title: Contact Management
sections.content:
Store and organize customer contact information in a centralized database.

Contact Features:

  • Contact Profiles: Complete customer information and history
  • Phone Numbers: Multiple phone number support
  • Tags & Categories: Organize contacts with custom tags
  • Interaction History: Complete call and message history

sections.title: Contact Operations
sections.content:
Perform bulk operations and manage contact lifecycle.

  • Bulk Import: CSV file import capabilities
  • Duplicate Detection: Automatic duplicate identification
  • Contact Segmentation: Group contacts for targeted campaigns
  • Data Export: Export contact data for external use

metaTitle: Contacts Management - CRM Features | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Manage customer contacts in the built-in CRM. Track interactions, notes, and communication history.
metaKeywords: contacts, CRM, customer management, contact database, customer records, interaction tracking
